response.answer_text: Souls are connected via the Source energy, All That Is - since all of them are parts of the Source energy on their journey through the Universe and all its realms. However, there are some specific connections that link some souls with each other. Birth of Souls. Souls are born from a Monad - the last unit of energy before individual souls are created. My research with hypnosis subjects shows that souls can be born alone, with a Twin Flame or in a group - and sometimes these groups have several couples in them. The Twin Flame connection is the strongest one between 2 souls, and the next would be the connection with all the members of the original “born together” group, like “soul multiples”. Some of these groups continue for ages as one consciousness collective, where all members are bonded by telepathic links.Souls’ history and reincarnations - souls who reincarnated together are bound by their mutual experiences traveling across the Universe and reincarnating on different worlds and planets. The Original Group or the Twin Flames can stay together in reincarnations or split apart, and the souls who were born alone meet many different beings on their journey and create bonds with some of them. This explains why there are opposite views on how Soul Groups are created - in Michael Newton’s books, Soul Groups are created at the birth of souls, as splitting of the energy unit into several souls - which I also see occasionally in my research. But in Edgar Cayce’s readings, he stated that Soul Families are created in incarnations - souls meeting each other in lives and creating bonds. It seems both are views correct, it just depends on the type of soul birth. Soul Groups also stay together between incarnations for study, enjoyment, and planning future lives.Souls’ interests and occupations. After souls gain some experience in incarnations they start showing interests and talents and chose “soul occupations” which unite them into schools, professional organizations, clubs by interest, creative groups, etc. We can’t exactly call it “a job” as there is no monetary exchange in the Spirit World - but we see schools, hospitals, governing bodies, counseling centers, libraries, entertainment venues in the Spirit World, where souls ‘work” between physical incarnations, or can practice any kind of art, music or science. In my sessions, I mostly deal with Healer Souls, or occasionally Specialist Guides who help incarnated humans in their professional endeavors. There are any occupations imaginable in the Spirit World and souls can form professional bonds and carry them into human incarnations - they would usually incarnate as colleagues or people united by the same passion or interest.Spiritual hierarchy defies relationships between Spirit Guides and their incarnating Students, Guides are also in training with higher level Guides and Ascended Masters. There are all kinds of Councils in the Spirit World - some are educational, others govern star systems, galaxies, star races, etc. There is often ‘chain of command” in relationships between souls - it mostly applies to incarnations, but there seems to be some sort of spiritual hierarchy also, as some souls have more power due to their wisdom and experience and can have a say in what souls can or can not do in the Spirit World and also in physical lives….

I have recently come to the astounding conclusion ‘All’ souls are connected to one another and connected to the ‘ultimate source of unconditional love’. That is so incredible because that means every soul has an infinite number of connections. So, why isn’t our ‘switch board’ so jammed that all we get is continuous ‘static?’ The connections vary in strength by degree. In other words, we choose which connections we want to enhance or strengthen for a particular experience or set of experiences. The ubiquitous connections were established as part of the origin of Creation. We began as a profound unity and have continued as a profound unity, even though within the unity is the combined infinity of all soul experience. We actually diminish the strength of connections by accepting a belief (usually taught or given to us by others) that we are disconnected and connections are impossible. My experience has been I could ‘make connections’ by consciously expressing a desire to ‘connect with so & so (my best guess of how to refer to the source I wanted to contact).’ My problem usually came after I connected and received the input I was looking for. At times I had trouble believing the input I was given because it was almost too incredible to believe. May you find the love, joy, and peace through the shortest route.

In order to address this question properly a brief explanation of what is the soul is appropriate . The human soul is that part of the constitution of man that develops after the creation of the physical body by our parents.Its nature is non material ,it develops in accordance to the human spiritual progress ,it’s the future vehicle or place of the personalty in the afterlife ,can’t be detected. Also could be said is the spiritual counterpart of an individual human in development instigated by the indwelling spirit of God the Father in collaboration with the human mind. If you are referring to that general belief of the soul mates ,it’s only a superstition.Souls are not connected. Affinity of personalities,is just that ,not to confuse with anything that it is not.

Soul the source energy that makes up all other forms of energy, space, matter and life so we are soul and have soul at the same time, we are connected to all life and the universe itself through soul. Its our consciousness an energy regulator that is the connection we feel to our soul and to others and the universe, when we bring our consciousness into full balance with very cell in the body like a lower animal we can feel this the strongest, I can feel the connection now but in EGMi deep meditation it is very strong as Buddha and Jesus felt it.

We all have an energy permeating our body and round our body. This energy interacts with the energy in all things and everyone. Its absorbed and even exchanged, and it is through this energy in all things and all people we are connected
